segments.text: You talked like the Terminator for two months ? Wow , I think you liked that movie even more than I liked ' Titanic . ' Why did you like ' Terminator ' so much ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , ' Terminator ' is a really great action movie , and I like action movies because they're exciting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Isn't ' Terminator ' really violent ? I usually don't like gory movies because they gross me out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is pretty violent , but since it's just robots fighting one another , it isn't very bloody and so it won't gross you out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm ... I don't know . Even though it may not be gory , I think it would still totally freak me out .
segments.speaker: S1
